title: buttons are not working when game launches
body: this happens almost every single game now. everything works fine until the game loads in and then NONE of my buttons work for any spells or hotkeys. I can type in chat just fine but nothing works. I have exit out of the game multiple times before they work again. Ideas?

replies.body:
Hmmmm your configuration files might be a little out of wack if none of your keybinds are working anymore. Let's reset those really quickly and you should be good to go. Keep in mind, this will reset any custom keybinds and settings you may currently have.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

If this were the issue shouldn't it impact every game? right now its impacting most of the games I play but not all. I'd say about 70-75% are impacted.

I will try it out and see if things improve.
